posts.description:
| Earth Kisses
.
"Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet." Thich Nhat Hanh
_________________________
üìçGranada, Nicaragua | #isletaelespino #isletadegranada #discovernicaragua | #thefittraveller
.

| Lake Cocibolca
.
There are 365 islands on this lake, created, as the legend goes, by the Mombacho volcano (the peak at the bottom of this photo). Each island is named for a tree, El Espino means Hawthorne.
.
I am literally one of only 5 humans on this island at @isletaelespino today, feeling the deeply beautiful peace of solitude in an isolated paradise...all to myself.
.
Have you ever been on an island by yourself? If so, tell me where you were and how you felt, if not is this on your list?
_____________________________
üìçGranada, Nicaragua | Captured with @insta360official | #isletaelespino #isletasdegranada #discovernicaragua | #insta360 #LifeAllIn | #thefittraveller
.

| Isleta
.
I'm making a mental note, that I like getaways on isletas, and casitas that come with binoculars and hammocks.
.
Settling in to this incredible secret hideaway on its own island, in Nicaragua. I'm swooning hard at @isletaelespino.
.
Want to know more about this incredible place? I'm putting the link in my bio for you, and I'm sharing every detail on my Story as always! Turn on your Post Notifications so you don't miss anything.
.
Happy Tuesday from my little hideaway on the lake!
__________________________
üìçGranada, Nicaragua | #isletaelespino #isletasdegranada #discovernicaragua #thehellyeslife
.

| Next Stop: @isletaelespino
.
I'm making my way nearly two hours north today, to Granada where I will be taken by boat to a private island to check into my villa here, at @isletaelespino! I cannot wait!
.
As always, follow my adventures on my Story, and turn your Post Notifications on so you don't miss anything.
.
Ready? Let's go!
______________________
üìçGranada, Nicaragua | #isletaelespino #thefittraveller #thehellyeslife
.

| Mukul Resort
.
"Feel like the only person on earth." - Mukul Resort
.
The secret is out, about Nicaragua and @mukulresort, Nicaragua's first luxury resort owned and dreamed up (in detail) by the Pellas family. The thought, care, detail, social and eco responsibility that has gone into creating this incredible property and each guest's experience has left me awe-struck.
.
Tell me one place you've visited in your life that has left you feeling this way.
__________________________
üìçMukul Resort, Nicaragua's Emerald Coast | #thefittraveller #onlynica #thehellyeslife
.

| Dear You
.
Dear You
in some
far off place
.
With your smell
of courage
and your
unabashed wit -
.
Talk to my
heart
with promises
of
bright days
ahead
.
Show me the way
with
your sexy
hands
and your
beautiful
light
.
Officially in-love with Nicaragua.
.
These words are from my poetry book @readthesewords, you can order your very own copy on Amazon or by shopping the link in my bio.
_______________________
üìç@mukulresort | @instagram #WHPnaturalbeauty
#onlynica
.

| Temples
.
"The rich will make temples for Shiva. What shall I, a poor man, do? My legs are pillars, the body the shrine, the head the cupola of gold." - Basava
.
There are six, yes six, spa temples here at @mukulresort, and each is a very different and sacred experience. It's no wonder Mukul's spa earned a spot on the top of the list of best spas in the world.
.
I'm experiencing the spas today while on retreat with @marytilson and @barefootluxuryretreats. Want to see inside of each one? Follow along on my Story here. Interested in learning more about this secret spot in Nicaragua? The link is in my bio.
.
This temple, The Healing Temple, is where you can have the "Yamuna Experience" for a short time while Yamuna is here. I'll be telling you more soon about my sacred healing session with this incredible healer.
.
Tell me what your very favorite spa treatment is.
_________________________
üìçMukul Redort, Nicaragua | üì∑: @marytilson | #mukulresort #barefootluxuryretreats #travelwithpb
.

| Magic
.
If you think things happen by accident, you are foolish. Chance encounters, serendipitous meetings, beautiful experiences, love, devotion, practice, life...it is all part of a bigger plan. No matter your belief, believe in magic. Expect it. And when it happens, bow down to it with all that you have and give thanks.
.
I don't have the words to describe the magic I felt with @marytilson on this yoga platform this morning, all I know in my heart and with my whole soul...is that I am supposed to be right here, right now.
.
To You, I bow deeply with all of the gratitude I have. I am forever grateful for this path, and the beautiful mirrors, teachers, and souls I meet along the way.
.
Thank you Mary, I love you.
_______________________
üìç@mukulresort | #thefittraveller #mukulresort #onlynica #barefootluxuryretreats
.

| Perfection
.
Last night's sunset at @mukulresort in Nicaragua is in my memory forever. The temperature here is perfect, the breeze is tropical and perfect, the air is light with just enough moisture to be perfect, the waves are the most perfect I've ever seen, the sound of the ocean from my bed is perfect, the colors...all of the incredible colors here, are perfect.
.
When you find yourself in a place of perfect, it's so easy to let go.
.
I'm here on retreat this weekend with @marytilson and her @barefootluxuryretreats. She is here at Mukul this month and next, guest teaching.
.
I'll be practicing daily yoga with Mary and experiencing the SIX spa temples here, I'm taking you along on my Story today and tomorrow. Turn the Post Notifications on so you don't miss out!
.
Wanna book your very own stay here, or retreat with Mary too? Peep the link in my bio!
.
Happy Weekend, loves! XO
__________________________
üìçNicaragua | #thefittraveller #travelwithpb #mukulresort
.

| Retreat
.
Wow, Nicaragua, wow! I arrived by prop plane this morning and checked in to my ocean view villa at @mukulresort and I'm never leaving! I'm serious. Bohio 9 is taken...until further notice.
.
I'm here on retreat with one of my very favorite world traveling yoginis and girl crushes @marytilson and I'm feeling so happy to be here and ready to dive into the wellness and yoga offered here.
.
Follow along, you have a front row seat and I'm here until Monday! I'm sharing everything on my Story and keep an eye on @thefittraveller account too...Mary and I will be doing a takeover there together!
.
Happy Friday from Nica! XO
_________________________
üìçGuacalito De La Isla, Nicaragua | #mukulresort #travelwithpb #barefootluxuryretreats
.
